Commands.kills: SELECT `Name` AS `Player Name`, `TribeName` AS `Tribe`, `PlayerKills` AS `Player Kills`, `PlayerDeaths` AS `Your Deaths`, `K/D` FROM `lethalquestsascended_stats` ORDER BY `K/D` DESC LIMIT 10;
Commands.rares: SELECT `Name` AS `Player Name`, `TribeName` AS `Tribe`, `RareTamedDinos` AS `Rare Tames`, `RareDinoKills` AS `Rare Kills`, `SuperRareDinoKills` AS `Super Rare Kills` FROM `lethalquestsascended_stats` ORDER BY SuperRareDinoKills DESC, RareDinoKills DESC, RareTamedDinos DESC LIMIT 10;

MyStats: `MinutesPlayed` AS `Minutes Played`, `PlayerKills` AS `Player Kills`, `PlayerDeaths` AS `Your Deaths`, `BossKills` AS `Boss Kills`, `RareTamedDinos` AS `Rare Tames`, `RareDinoKills` AS `Rare Kills`, `SuperRareDinoKills` AS `Super Rare Kills`, `MissionsCompleted` AS `Completed Missions`
NoResults: No Results Found! Use `/linkstats` in game first.
